name: Purple Sage
description: Purple Sage is a hybrid strain that provides a mental lift typical of its sativa heritage while still treating pain with an indica punch. The plants are a cross between an unknown purple mix and some SAGE genetics. Purple Sage also boasts a unique sweet and spicy aroma.
attributes_title: Euphoric, Uplifted, Creative, Happy, Aroused, Pain, Stress, Depression, Fatigue, Insomnia, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes
